name: The Royal Hunt 1.2
description:
This is The Royal Hunt. You play as a king, hunting in your own private hunting grounds. Your servants create you an arena, release a number of animals in the arena, and randomly place a number of obstacles. Your goal is to hunt all the animals in each arena. 

We welcome your feedback, and if you enjoyed the game please head over to https://www.kongregate.com/games/Ahmrood/the-royal-hunt

And rate my game there too!
